settings.text:
Please be advised that our Lloydminster store located at

2628H - 50 Avenue

will be closed for renovations from Monday July 18,2022 until Friday July 29,2022.

We will reopen for business on Tuesday August 2,2022 at 8:30 AM.

We apologize for any inconvenience this closure may cause, we will provide no charge shipping for any order you need to place during this time .

Please contact our Customer service departmentÂ at 1 800 642 3818 for assistance.

Watch for our Grand Reopening celebration in September with special pricing,gifts with purchase and in store demos.
